translation: Zero's here! She's invading!{#Name="Soldier A"}
source: Zero's here! She's invading!{#Name="Soldier A"}

translation: Back me up! I'm going in!{#Name="Soldier B"}
source: Back me up! I'm going in!{#Name="Soldier B"}

translation: I've got your back!{#Name="Soldier C"}
source: I've got your back!{#Name="Soldier C"}

translation: Where are the medics!?{#Name="Soldier D"}
source: Where are the medics!?{#Name="Soldier D"}

translation: Can we really kill an Intoner!?{#Name="Soldier E"}
source: Can we really kill an Intoner!?{#Name="Soldier E"}

translation: Ohhh! Such a dreadful sight!{#Name="Soldier F"}
source: Ohhh! Such a dreadful sight!{#Name="Soldier F"}

translation: Aaaaaggghh! The accursed Intoner is here!{#Name="Soldier G"}
source: Aaaaaggghh! The accursed Intoner is here!{#Name="Soldier G"}

translation: Ugh! How can they be so damn tough!?{#Name="Soldier B"}
source: Ugh! How can they be so damn tough!?{#Name="Soldier B"}

translation: Don't underestimate her!{#Name="Soldier E"}
source: Don't underestimate her!{#Name="Soldier E"}

translation: 来るかッ？　来るかッ？{#Name="兵士C"}
source: 来るかッ？　来るかッ？{#Name="兵士C"}

translation: 来たあああああッ！{#Name="兵士D"}
source: 来たあああああッ！{#Name="兵士D"}

translation: 援護しますッ{#Name="兵士G"}
source: 援護しますッ{#Name="兵士G"}

translation: 死にたいのか？　老いぼれにかまわず行けッ！{#Name="兵士F"}
source: 死にたいのか？　老いぼれにかまわず行けッ！{#Name="兵士F"}

translation: She's...too damn strong!{#Name="Soldier A"}
source: She's...too damn strong!{#Name="Soldier A"}

translation: We knew that when we took this job!{#Name="Soldier C"}
source: We knew that when we took this job!{#Name="Soldier C"}

translation: That's right! We knew we were fighting an Intoner!{#Name="Soldier D"}
source: That's right! We knew we were fighting an Intoner!{#Name="Soldier D"}

translation: We need to stop her here!{#Name="Soldier E"}
source: We need to stop her here!{#Name="Soldier E"}

translation: Let's do this!{#Name="Soldier F"}
source: Let's do this!{#Name="Soldier F"}

translation: Her sword... I can't even follow it!{#Name="Soldier G"}
source: Her sword... I can't even follow it!{#Name="Soldier G"}

translation: Don't stand still! They'll kill you!{#Name="Soldier A"}
source: Don't stand still! They'll kill you!{#Name="Soldier A"}

translation: Shit!{#Name="Soldier B"}
source: Shit!{#Name="Soldier B"}

translation: Look out!{#Name="Soldier G"}
source: Look out!{#Name="Soldier G"}

translation: I can't go any further!{#Name="Soldier C"}
source: I can't go any further!{#Name="Soldier C"}

translation: You! Fall back!{#Name="Soldier F"}
source: You! Fall back!{#Name="Soldier F"}

translation: No, leave me! Focus on Zero!{#Name="Soldier C"}
source: No, leave me! Focus on Zero!{#Name="Soldier C"}

translation: Show 'em what we mortals are made of!{#Name="Soldier B"}
source: Show 'em what we mortals are made of!{#Name="Soldier B"}

translation: Show 'em what we mortals are made of!{#Name="Soldier B"}
source: Show 'em what we mortals are made of!{#Name="Soldier B"}

translation: There she is! Chaaaarge!{#Name="Soldier C"}
source: There she is! Chaaaarge!{#Name="Soldier C"}

translation: Aaaaaaaargh!{#Name="Soldier D"}
source: Aaaaaaaargh!{#Name="Soldier D"}

translation: The only way to overcome your fear is to charge forward! Do it!{#Name="Soldier C"}
source: The only way to overcome your fear is to charge forward! Do it!{#Name="Soldier C"}

translation: Get over here, demon, so I can kill you!{#Name="Soldier E"}
source: Get over here, demon, so I can kill you!{#Name="Soldier E"}

translation: Watch what you wish for, fool! Remember, she's an Intoner!{#Name="Soldier F"}
source: Watch what you wish for, fool! Remember, she's an Intoner!{#Name="Soldier F"}

translation: A dark Intoner bent on destroying the world...{#Name="Soldier G"}
source: A dark Intoner bent on destroying the world...{#Name="Soldier G"}

translation: April the 14th, 1000 A.D.{#Name="Zero"}
source: April the 14th, 1000 A.D.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: We were pursuing Three in the Land of Forests,{#Name="Zero"}
source: We were pursuing Three in the Land of Forests,{#Name="Zero"}

translation: but after obtaining a vital piece of info from Cent,{#Name="Zero"}
source: but after obtaining a vital piece of info from Cent,{#Name="Zero"}

translation: we decided to head back into the mountains...{#Name="Zero"}
source: we decided to head back into the mountains...{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Nnngh! It's freezing here!{#Name="Dito"}
source: Nnngh! It's freezing here!{#Name="Dito"}

translation: You better not be wrong about this, Cent.{#Name="Zero"}
source: You better not be wrong about this, Cent.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Me? Wrong? Ha! How absurd.{#Name="Cent"}
source: Me? Wrong? Ha! How absurd.{#Name="Cent"}

translation: The most spectacularly delicious fruit{LF}in the world is juuuuuust ahead!{#Name="Cent"}
source: The most spectacularly delicious fruit{LF}in the world is juuuuuust ahead!{#Name="Cent"}

translation: No fruit is worth trompin'{LF}through all this ice and shit.{#Name="Dito"}
source: No fruit is worth trompin'{LF}through all this ice and shit.{#Name="Dito"}

translation: If I'd known it would be this cold,{LF}I'd have stayed in the forest{LF}and tracked down Z's sisters.{#Name="Dito"}
source: If I'd known it would be this cold,{LF}I'd have stayed in the forest{LF}and tracked down Z's sisters.{#Name="Dito"}

translation: Well, you can't fight on an empty{LF}stomach or...whatever.{#Name="Zero"}
source: Well, you can't fight on an empty{LF}stomach or...whatever.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Yaaay! Whatever! Whatever is my favorite!{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: Yaaay! Whatever! Whatever is my favorite!{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: But this better be the best{LF}damn fruit I ever tasted.{#Name="Zero"}
source: But this better be the best{LF}damn fruit I ever tasted.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Don't you worry. It is delicious beyond compare!{#Name="Cent"}
source: Don't you worry. It is delicious beyond compare!{#Name="Cent"}

translation: The fruit is called a mendesian. Delightful, no?{#Name="Cent"}
source: The fruit is called a mendesian. Delightful, no?{#Name="Cent"}

translation: Eaten alone, it has a clean,{LF}crisp taste redolent of spring.{#Name="Cent"}
source: Eaten alone, it has a clean,{LF}crisp taste redolent of spring.{#Name="Cent"}

translation: But you can also make it into a rich{LF}jam to spread on bread or meat!{#Name="Cent"}
source: But you can also make it into a rich{LF}jam to spread on bread or meat!{#Name="Cent"}

translation: And nutritious? Oh my heavens, yes!{#Name="Cent"}
source: And nutritious? Oh my heavens, yes!{#Name="Cent"}

translation: Far more so than your typical fruit, I might add.{#Name="Cent"}
source: Far more so than your typical fruit, I might add.{#Name="Cent"}

translation: Tell me, is it any good for the old trouser snake?{#Name="Octa"}
source: Tell me, is it any good for the old trouser snake?{#Name="Octa"}

translation: Good? It's nothing short of spectacular!{#Name="Cent"}
source: Good? It's nothing short of spectacular!{#Name="Cent"}

translation: Oh ho ho! Well, there's a piece of fine news.{#Name="Octa"}
source: Oh ho ho! Well, there's a piece of fine news.{#Name="Octa"}

translation: I can already feel my mem—er,{LF}emotions stirring at the thought!{#Name="Octa"}
source: I can already feel my mem—er,{LF}emotions stirring at the thought!{#Name="Octa"}

translation: Cerberus, huh?{#Name="Dito"}
source: Cerberus, huh?{#Name="Dito"}

translation: Hey, you think he tastes any good?{#Name="Dito"}
source: Hey, you think he tastes any good?{#Name="Dito"}

translation: Who can say? I doubt many ever{LF}had the chance to sample one.{#Name="Octa"}
source: Who can say? I doubt many ever{LF}had the chance to sample one.{#Name="Octa"}

translation: I ate one once. Not bad. Lots of gristle.{#Name="Zero"}
source: I ate one once. Not bad. Lots of gristle.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: The gristle was the best part!{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: The gristle was the best part!{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: Nnngh... Lady Zero, your diet{LF}is a bewildering thing.{#Name="Decadus"}
source: Nnngh... Lady Zero, your diet{LF}is a bewildering thing.{#Name="Decadus"}

translation: Goddammit, it's cold! Where's your{LF}stupid mendesian already?{#Name="Zero"}
source: Goddammit, it's cold! Where's your{LF}stupid mendesian already?{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Oh, we're close! Ever so close. {#Name="Cent"}
source: Oh, we're close! Ever so close. {#Name="Cent"}

translation: I'm going to turn it into jam and eat it{LF}by the spoonful!{#Name="Decadus"}
source: I'm going to turn it into jam and eat it{LF}by the spoonful!{#Name="Decadus"}

translation: I'm gonna rub it all over my...uh...self!{#Name="Octa"}
source: I'm gonna rub it all over my...uh...self!{#Name="Octa"}

translation: I can't believe we're actually trusting{LF}this idiot...{#Name="Dito"}
source: I can't believe we're actually trusting{LF}this idiot...{#Name="Dito"}

translation: Ah!{#Name="Cent"}
source: Ah!{#Name="Cent"}

translation: That treasure chest there!{#Name="Cent"}
source: That treasure chest there!{#Name="Cent"}

translation: ...Oh dear.{#Name="Cent"}
source: ...Oh dear.{#Name="Cent"}

translation: ...What the hell?{#Name="Zero"}
source: ...What the hell?{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Ah... Ah ha ha! Yeaaah, I'm thinking I may{LF}have been a little off on this...{#Name="Cent"}
source: Ah... Ah ha ha! Yeaaah, I'm thinking I may{LF}have been a little off on this...{#Name="Cent"}

translation: Oh, I just remembered! It's actually{LF}in the chest up ahead!{#Name="Cent"}
source: Oh, I just remembered! It's actually{LF}in the chest up ahead!{#Name="Cent"}

translation: I got a bad feeling about this.{#Name="Dito"}
source: I got a bad feeling about this.{#Name="Dito"}

translation: Right here! This is it for sure!{#Name="Cent"}
source: Right here! This is it for sure!{#Name="Cent"}

translation: The treasure chest was empty.{#Name=" "}
source: The treasure chest was empty.{#Name=" "}

translation: {06}>{#Name="Dito"}
source: {06}>{#Name="Dito"}

translation: {06}>{#Name="Octa"}
source: {06}>{#Name="Octa"}

translation: {06}>{#Name="Decadus"}
source: {06}>{#Name="Decadus"}

translation: Okay. Executive decision.{#Name="Zero"}
source: Okay. Executive decision.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Next time we see a cerberus,{LF}we're gonna feed it Cent.{#Name="Zero"}
source: Next time we see a cerberus,{LF}we're gonna feed it Cent.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: 仕方ないじゃないですかぁあ。{LF}食べたら美味しいのは、事実なんですよぉお。{#Name="セント"}
source: 仕方ないじゃないですかぁあ。{LF}食べたら美味しいのは、事実なんですよぉお。{#Name="セント"}

translation: 私達は食べそびれたわけだから、{LF}その事実はどうでもいいんじゃないか？{#Name="デカート"}
source: 私達は食べそびれたわけだから、{LF}その事実はどうでもいいんじゃないか？{#Name="デカート"}

translation: あ、そうだ！　{LF}キングはぁあ、パスタにまぜても……{#Name="セント"}
source: あ、そうだ！　{LF}キングはぁあ、パスタにまぜても……{#Name="セント"}

translation: だから！　現物がないのに{LF}料理方法を教えてくださらんで結構！{#Name="オクタ"}
source: だから！　現物がないのに{LF}料理方法を教えてくださらんで結構！{#Name="オクタ"}

translation: Okay. Executive decision.{#Name="Zero"}
source: Okay. Executive decision.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Next time we see a cerberus,{LF}we're gonna feed it Cent.{#Name="Zero"}
source: Next time we see a cerberus,{LF}we're gonna feed it Cent.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: I got a bad feeling about this.{#Name="Dito"}
source: I got a bad feeling about this.{#Name="Dito"}

translation: I know I've said it before, but if you don't change{LF}course soon, things are not going to end well.{#Name="Accord"}
source: I know I've said it before, but if you don't change{LF}course soon, things are not going to end well.{#Name="Accord"}

translation: That what your little book says?{#Name="Zero"}
source: That what your little book says?{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Indeed.{#Name="Accord"}
source: Indeed.{#Name="Accord"}

translation: ...So you're not gonna show it to me?{#Name="Zero"}
source: ...So you're not gonna show it to me?{#Name="Zero"}

translation: I've been instructed not to interfere with the world.{#Name="Accord"}
source: I've been instructed not to interfere with the world.{#Name="Accord"}

translation: Liar.{#Name="Zero"}
source: Liar.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: No, it's true!{#Name="Accord"}
source: No, it's true!{#Name="Accord"}

translation: But...well, nobody said I couldn't give little bits of advice, at least?{#Name="Accord"}
source: But...well, nobody said I couldn't give little bits of advice, at least?{#Name="Accord"}

translation: What the hell are you, anyway?{#Name="Zero"}
source: What the hell are you, anyway?{#Name="Zero"}

translation: We're Recorders.{#Name="Accord"}
source: We're Recorders.{#Name="Accord"}

translation: Recorders?{#Name="Zero"}
source: Recorders?{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Right. It's our job to record world events,{LF}from the ancient past to the distant future...{#Name="Accord"}
source: Right. It's our job to record world events,{LF}from the ancient past to the distant future...{#Name="Accord"}

translation: You know the "Old World" you people are always going on about?{#Name="Accord"}
source: You know the "Old World" you people are always going on about?{#Name="Accord"}

translation: Well, I was sent by folks from there.{#Name="Accord"}
source: Well, I was sent by folks from there.{#Name="Accord"}

translation: Listen, I don't know jack about the Old World.{#Name="Zero"}
source: Listen, I don't know jack about the Old World.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: But if you're following me just to make recordings{LF}or whatever, you can knock it the fuck off.{#Name="Zero"}
source: But if you're following me just to make recordings{LF}or whatever, you can knock it the fuck off.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Well, sure, that's all I'm supposed to be doing...{#Name="Accord"}
source: Well, sure, that's all I'm supposed to be doing...{#Name="Accord"}

translation: But after all these bad endings you keep encountering,{LF}I'm really tempted to help.{#Name="Accord"}
source: But after all these bad endings you keep encountering,{LF}I'm really tempted to help.{#Name="Accord"}

translation: Now, let's try and wrap things up in a way that benefits all of us, hmm?{#Name="Accord"}
source: Now, let's try and wrap things up in a way that benefits all of us, hmm?{#Name="Accord"}

translation: Like I need you to tell me. I can wrap things up myself.{#Name="Zero"}
source: Like I need you to tell me. I can wrap things up myself.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Defeat the Gray Cerberus!{#Name="説明文"}
source: Defeat the Gray Cerberus!{#Name="説明文"}

translation: Defeat the enemies blocking your way!{#Name="説明文"}
source: Defeat the enemies blocking your way!{#Name="説明文"}

translation: Search for Cent's precious fruit.{#Name="説明文"}
source: Search for Cent's precious fruit.{#Name="説明文"}

translation: 次のシーケンスに移行しますか？{#Name=" "}
source: 次のシーケンスに移行しますか？{#Name=" "}

translation: Can't...take this anymore... Zzz...{#Name="Dito"}
source: Can't...take this anymore... Zzz...{#Name="Dito"}

translation: Stew... So nice and warm... Zzz...{#Name="Dito"}
source: Stew... So nice and warm... Zzz...{#Name="Dito"}

translation: Zzz... Mmmngh... H-Huh? Oh, my!{#Name="Decadus"}
source: Zzz... Mmmngh... H-Huh? Oh, my!{#Name="Decadus"}

translation: Zzz... Unnngh... Jam...all over...face...{#Name="Decadus"}
source: Zzz... Unnngh... Jam...all over...face...{#Name="Decadus"}

translation: Oh ho ho... Behold my...massive trunk... Zzzzzz...{#Name="Octa"}
source: Oh ho ho... Behold my...massive trunk... Zzzzzz...{#Name="Octa"}

translation: Oh... You haven't...seen anything yet... Zzzzzz...{#Name="Octa"}
source: Oh... You haven't...seen anything yet... Zzzzzz...{#Name="Octa"}

translation: Zzz... Mrrmm... Yum...my...{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: Zzz... Mrrmm... Yum...my...{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: Zzz... Mrrmm... Zero... Zero...{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: Zzz... Mrrmm... Zero... Zero...{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: Zzz... Huh? You're...going to sleep...Lady Zero?{#Name="Cent"}
source: Zzz... Huh? You're...going to sleep...Lady Zero?{#Name="Cent"}

translation: How...strange... Zzz...{#Name="Cent"}
source: How...strange... Zzz...{#Name="Cent"}

translation: I'd better get some rest, too...{#Name="Zero"}
source: I'd better get some rest, too...{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Get some much-needed sleep?{#Name=" "}
source: Get some much-needed sleep?{#Name=" "}

translation: I'll kill you! I swear I'll kill you!{#Name="Soldier C"}
source: I'll kill you! I swear I'll kill you!{#Name="Soldier C"}

translation: All right, next up...we've got this recording from Branch B.{#Name="Accord"}
source: All right, next up...we've got this recording from Branch B.{#Name="Accord"}

translation: No, not that one—that's Branch C!{#Name="Accord"}
source: No, not that one—that's Branch C!{#Name="Accord"}

translation: And THAT'S Branch A! Come on!{#Name="Accord"}
source: And THAT'S Branch A! Come on!{#Name="Accord"}

translation: There we go. That's Branch B! Finally...{#Name="Accord"}
source: There we go. That's Branch B! Finally...{#Name="Accord"}

translation: Okay then! Let's have a look at recording M2410_E0005_FL...{#Name="Accord"}
source: Okay then! Let's have a look at recording M2410_E0005_FL...{#Name="Accord"}

translation: Mmm...yeah. It's not this one either...{#Name="Cent"}
source: Mmm...yeah. It's not this one either...{#Name="Cent"}

translation: Um... Maybe the next mountain over?{#Name="Cent"}
source: Um... Maybe the next mountain over?{#Name="Cent"}

translation: Orrrr maybe the next nation over?{#Name="Cent"}
source: Orrrr maybe the next nation over?{#Name="Cent"}

translation: ...Cent?{#Name="Zero"}
source: ...Cent?{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Yeees?{#Name="Cent"}
source: Yeees?{#Name="Cent"}

translation: You're just making this shit up, aren't you?{#Name="Zero"}
source: You're just making this shit up, aren't you?{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Me? No, no! Never! No! ...No. {#Name="Cent"}
source: Me? No, no! Never! No! ...No. {#Name="Cent"}

translation: It's definitely, probably, somewhere{LF}on this continent.{#Name="Cent"}
source: It's definitely, probably, somewhere{LF}on this continent.{#Name="Cent"}

translation: That's it! I'm gonna pull your{LF}heart out your asshole!{#Name="Dito"}
source: That's it! I'm gonna pull your{LF}heart out your asshole!{#Name="Dito"}

translation: Oh, hey! Now I remember! It's right over there!{#Name="Cent"}
source: Oh, hey! Now I remember! It's right over there!{#Name="Cent"}

translation: Battered and exhausted after following{LF}Cent like a bunch of idiots,{#Name="Zero"}
source: Battered and exhausted after following{LF}Cent like a bunch of idiots,{#Name="Zero"}

translation: we were forced to take shelter{LF}on a snowy mountainside.{#Name="Zero"}
source: we were forced to take shelter{LF}on a snowy mountainside.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Worthless trash obtained.{#Name="説明文"}
source: Worthless trash obtained.{#Name="説明文"}

translation: ...Even more worthless trash obtained.{#Name="説明文"}
source: ...Even more worthless trash obtained.{#Name="説明文"}
